item.title: Experience: volunteering in scenic Gorna
item.author: Mandeep K Dhingra,Mimi Li,
item.description: This summer we spent two weeks volunteering in Gorna, as part of a trip with Imperial College Aid to the Balkans (ICAB). Gorna is a small, picturesque town in northern Bulgaria with just over 30,000 inhabitants. ICAB is a student-run charity that typically sends its volunteers to Bulgarian â€¦
